title: PetPal
description: A pet care management app that tracks feeding, walks, and veterinary appointments.
introduction: PetPal is a comprehensive pet care management app designed to simplify the lives of pet owners by tracking feeding schedules, walks, and veterinary appointments. The app aims to ensure pets receive consistent care while providing owners with peace of mind.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: As pet owners ourselves, we noticed a gap in the market for a user-friendly app that consolidates all aspects of pet care. Existing solutions were either too fragmented or lacked essential features. Our motivation was to create a one-stop solution that simplifies pet care management.

sections.title: Initial Design
sections.body: We began by conducting user surveys to identify the most critical features pet owners needed. This led us to prioritize feeding schedules, walk tracking, and vet appointment reminders. We then sketched wireframes and created a basic prototype to visualize the app's workflow.

sections.title: Prototype Development
sections.body: Using React Native, we developed a minimum viable product (MVP) that allowed users to set reminders, log activities, and view a calendar of upcoming events. Initial user testing revealed the need for a more intuitive interface and additional features like pet profile customization.

sections.title: Feature Expansion
sections.body: We expanded the app to include advanced features such as AI-powered feeding reminders, integration with popular pet wearable devices, and video call functionality for virtual vet consultations. These additions were made possible by leveraging Python for backend development and TensorFlow for AI capabilities.

sections.title: Launch and Future Plans
sections.body: After a successful beta launch, we received positive feedback from users who appreciated the app's ease of use and comprehensive feature set. Moving forward, we plan to integrate community features for pet owners and explore partnerships with pet food and supply companies.
